name: Road Rally: Racing Master 3D
description:
Drive fast and feel the speed fever!

Meet the best pocket rally of 2015 - Road Rally: Racing Master 3D! It’s a kind of racing championship, where everyone wants to win, but there will be only one winner. Feel the racing fever, drive fast and become this winner! Ready, set, go!

Drive as fast as you can, but avoid crashing and damaging. Raise high speed and use brakes pedal to throttle down, otherwise you’ll fail to negotiate corner and become a loser. Check your endurance and enjoy infinite drag racing – outrace all your racing rivals and clock the fastest time!

Road Rally: Racing Master 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Real tracks with sharp turns;
- Amazing sport cars;
- Realistic car controls;
- Realistic physics like in crash tests;
- Great graphics and sound effects.

Road Rally: Racing Master 3D – prove you’re the best racer and drift hero!
